Title: Sinai, St. Catherine’s Monastery, Arabic NF M 28 (MSI)
Contents note: 1. The Gospel of John; 2. Mimar of our holy father John Chrysostom of the ecumenical teacher, archbishop of the City of Byzantium of the Birth of our Lord Jesus Christ; 3. The other word of John Chrysostom, sermon to the monks; 4. From the canon of the apostles. Testament of the Apostle Paul.
Author: John Chrysostom, Saint, -407
Condition note: Two unsewn quires. Arabic NF 8, Arabic NF 27, and Arabic NF 28 originally belonged to the same ms.
Script note: Titles in red ink. Text continues from Arabic NF 8, pencil foliation in Arabic NF 28 begins fol. 128.

Condition note: Unbound quire; most of outer margin missing; large area at lower half missing throughout.

Title: Sinai, St. Catherine’s Monastery, Syriac NF M 64 (MSI)
Contents note: Two palimpsests in Greek and CPA
Foliation: Pencil foliation on the top left of each recto was added after imaging, in accordance with Mother Philothea's (MP) catalog. Katikon numbers correspond to MP numbers as follows: 1r (MP 1r), 1v (MP 1v), 2r (MP 4r), 2v (MP 4v), 3r (MP 2r), 3v (MP 2v), 4r (MP 3r), 4v (MP 3v).
